title: Mr. Fox and Miss Rose
overview: Two completely different 'species' meet unexpectedly, thus beginning a story of 'taming' each other. One is a female chieftain from a mysterious tribe while the other is a black-bellied corporate powerhouse.Gao Zhen He is a steely man who makes a living from the exploration of high-end gems. After surviving an accident that sent him off a cliff, Gao Zhen He stumble upon a primitive tribe dominated by women. Its leader Xing Yue rescues him with the intention of making him her man. In order to obtain a rare gem from the tribe, Gao Zhen He pretends to marry Xing Yue and bolts the first chance that he gets. Xing Yue heads off to the big city alone to retrieve what's hers.
